channel.title: Labor Discontent on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Labor Discontent on FinanClub

item.title: UAL
item.description: score:-9 Chances: UAL just ran into a historically bearish trendline on the charts Morgan Stanley upgraded amusement park operator Six Flags (SIX) to ‘Overweight’ from ‘Equal Weight’ and raised its price target to $32 on expectations for accelerating revenue growth in 2024 Goldman Sachs named Delta (DAL) and United (UAL) its top airline stock picks for 2024 Risks: Labor discontent is rife in the skies over the U.
